crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.active || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'outbound_cid':doc.outbound_cid, 'user_id':doc.user_id, 'cid':doc.cid, 'pin':doc.pin}); }

cid_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.cid || !doc.active || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.cid, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'outbound_cid':doc.outbound_cid, 'user_id':doc.user_id, 'pin':doc.pin});}

pin_listing.map: function(doc) {if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.active || doc.pvt_deleted || (!doc.pin && !doc.cid)) return;var auth_pin = [doc.cid ? doc.cid : '*', doc.pin ? doc.pin : '*'];emit(auth_pin, {'id': doc._id,'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id,'outbound_cid': doc.outbound_cid,'user_id': doc.user_id});}
